segments.text: What's your plan for your future ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to work in a law firm to enrich my experience and put what I've learned into practice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you had any previous experience ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . During the college years , I worked as a trainee every summer at lawyer's offices . Does that count ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course it counts . What kind of work did you do there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did clerical stuff and ran errands .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In this office , we encourage full attendance by offering a bonus . If you take any leaves , we'll deduct money from your salary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I know about the office hours ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Office hours are nine to five-thirty . One hour for lunch . Do you have any questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Er , may I know how much I will be paid monthly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll give you about 3000 to start . There'll be a trial period of three month . After six months , we'll have a job performance review and consider giving you a raise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When will I know your decision ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll call you in a day or two , did you write down your phone number on your resume ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did . Can you call after 7 p . m . ? I'm usually out in the daytime .
segments.speaker: S2
